About

What is Iotify?

IoTIFY is industry’s first cloud-based IoT performance testing platform helping developers build scalable IoT Applications handling Millions of connected devices.

This allows simulation of devices such as solar cells, CMOS sensors, LEDs, TFTs, EPROMs, aggressive technology.

Services

Rapid IoT Development

Device 3D™ is a physics based 3D device simulator for any device type and includes material properties for the commonly used semiconductor materials in use today.

This allows simulation of devices such as solar cells, CMOS sensors, LEDs, TFTs, EPROMs, aggressive technology.
